page.title: 16THE RED LION IN BROUGHTON
page.content: THEY GET MORE CUSTOMERS ON WEEK-ENDS. THE LANDLORD HAS BEEN WORKING THERE FOR JUST UNDER 4 YEARS.7 PEOPLE WORK THERE .IT OPENS AT 10.30am -2.30pm AND 5.30pm -11.00pm EXCEPT ON SUNDAYS WHEN IT CLOSES AT 10.30pm.THE PUB RUNS 2 FOOTBALL TEAMS,2 POOL TEAMS AND 1 DARTS TEAM.THE LANDLORD OWNS 8 RABBITS AND 1 DOG.HE DOES NOT HAVE ANY BIG PROBLEMS.HE SELLS A LOT OF STEAKS.LAGER IS THE MOST POPULAR DRINK SOLD.THE CHEAPEST DRINK IS ORANGE SQUASH WHICH COSTS 12p.THE DEAREST DRINK IS A STRONG LAGER THAT COSTS 86p A PINT.THEY SELL FOOD. THE CHEAPEST FOOD IS A ROLL AT 25p.HE LIKES HIS JOB BECAUSE HE LIKES MEETING PEOPLE. THE DEAREST FOOD IS A 14oz. STEAK WHICH COSTS 5 POUNDS.SINCE THE BY-PASS OPENED THERE HAS BEEN A DROP IN LUNCH-TIME CUSTOMERS.
